import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { UserDataService } from 'src/app/services/user/userData/user-data.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-avatar', templateUrl: './avatar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./avatar.component.css'] }) export class AvatarComponent { userData:any = {} constructor(user:UserDataService){ user.user().subscribe((res)=>{ this.userData = res.data }) } }
